DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : This study Randomized , Double Blind , Multi-center , Active Drug Controlled , Phase III Clinical Trial Compare Safety Efficacy DWP450 Versus Botox® Treatment Post Stroke Upper Limb ( wrist , finger , elbow , thumb ) Spasticity .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double Blind , Multi-center , Active Drug Controlled , Phase III Clinical Trial Compare Safety Efficacy DWP450 Versus Botox® Treatment Post Stroke Upper Limb Spasticity
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female adult patient 2 . ≥ 6 week since last stroke 1.Patients diagnose neuromuscular disorder LamberEaton syndrome , myasthenia gravis , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis .
